description: Join Assemblage Collective for this manifesto zine-making workshop, all about expressing yourself and your ideas for a better world! Learn how to craft a zine (like a mini book, from the word maga-zine), then use a range of materials to draw, collage, stamp, write and create a playful manifesto for the future.

events.name: Drop in: Zine Making with Assemblage Collective
events.notes:
Please let us know if you plan to visit. Doing so allows
                    the venue to plan ahead and you will be notified by email
                    about any changes to the programme that might affect your
                    visit.

factsheet.heading: Manifesto Zines Family Workshop
paragraphs: Join Assemblage Collective for this manifesto zine-making workshop all about expressing yourself and your ideas for a better world! Learn how to craft a zine (like a mini book, from the word maga-zine), then use a range of materials to draw, collage, stamp, write and create a playful manifesto for the future.

location.address: Smithfield Rotunda Garden, West Smithfield, EC1A 9PT

name: Bartholomew Fayre: Manifesto Zines Family Workshop
